author: Tom Nicholas
description:
Watch my debut feature-length documentary BOOMERS on Nebula here: https://go.nebula.tv/tomnicholas

Get 40% off an annual subscription to Nebula: https://go.nebula.tv/tomnicholas

British pubs are in crisis. Can J.D. Wetherspoon save them? Come with me on an 800 mile road trip to find out...

Written, directed, and presented by Tom Nicholas.
Filmed and edited by Georgia Burrows.
Additional research and production assistance by Jack Carter.

*Chapters*
00:00 Meet Tim Martin
02:19 Day One: The Rise and Rise of Wetherspoon
31:34 Day: Stack 'em High, Sell 'em Cheap
01:05:08 Day Three: Cask Ale and the Culture War

Watch this video ad- and sponsor-free on Nebula at https://nebula.tv/videos/tomnicholas-closing-time-can-wetherspoon-save-the-great-british-pub?ref=tomnicholas

*Blurb*
J.D. Wetherspoon, or simply "spoons" to its friends, is a British institution. With over 800 pubs in towns and cities across the country, it's not only a regular haunt for many Brits but has also made its way ont
title: Wetherspoon: Inside Britain's Most Controversial Pubs
